name: tor-mirrorbot
description: A Telegram bot for all your mirror needs

DESCRIPTION.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable Webhooks when in env mode, value

\"BOT_TOKEN\".value:
"The telegram bot token that you get from @BotFather.",
        "required"

\"GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID\".value:
"This is the folder ID of the Google Drive Folder to which you want to upload all the mirrors.",
        "required"

},\n \"TOKEN_PICKLE_URL\".value:
"(Optional) Only if you want to load your token.pickle externally from an index link. Fill this with the direct link of that file.",
        "required"

},\n \"HEROKU_API_KEY\".value: "Your Heroku API key, get it from https

},\n \"TELEGRAM_HASH\".value: "This is to authenticate to your Telegram account for downloading Telegram files. You can get this from https

},\n \"TELEGRAM_API\".value: "This is to authenticate to your Telegram account for downloading Telegram files. You can get this from https

\"IS_TEAM_DRIVE\".value:
"Set to 'True' if GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID is from a Team Drive else False or Leave it empty.",
        "required"

},\n \"AUTO_DELETE_MESSAGE_DURATION.value: "Interval of time (in seconds), after which the bot deletes it's message (and command message) which is expected to be viewed instantly. Note

},\n \"OWNER_ID\".value:
"The Telegram User ID of the Owner of the Bot. Get it by using /info in @MissRose_bot.",
        "required"

\"DOWNLOAD_STATUS_UPDATE_INTERVAL\".value:
"A short interval of time in seconds after which the Mirror progress message is updated. (I recommend to keep it 5 seconds at least).",
        "value"

},\n \"DOWNLOAD_DIR\".value:
"The path to the local folder where the downloads should be downloaded to.",
        "value"
